job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Staffing and Recruiting,Financial Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ltpgtSelby Jennings is working with a high level banking institution to find the best technology talent to build their FinTech team They have multiple teams hiring for various roles with fulltime opportunities Read below for the responsibilities and qualifications of the role to see if its a good fit for youampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtOwn your system as you write new codeAPIs and have a large impact on different productsltligtltligtEntrepreneurial approach to problem solving and solution developmentltligtltligtAssist in defining the technical architecture of mission critical systemsltligtltligtFind and implement new technology and research to further develop the systems youve createdltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or relevant fieldltligtltligtAt least 16 years of experience as a professional software engineerltligtltligtMastery of Java technologiesltligtltligtStrong understanding of modern software architectureltligtltligtExperience with fullstack JS React Nodejs and othersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtOthers to be consideredltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAWS experienceltligtltligtBig data technology experience kafka or hadoopltligtltligtPrevious financial experienceltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtMade it this far Take the time to apply and submit your resumeltpgt
